snippet: Jakub Voracek beat goalie Marc-Andre Fleury from in close to give Philadelphia a comeback victory at Pittsburgh.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Philadelphia Flyers have comeback victory over the Pittsburgh Penguins, 4-3, in Game 1 of their Eastern Conference quarterfinal series.
lead_paragraph: Jakub Voracek beat goalie Marc-Andre Fleury from in close to give Philadelphia a comeback victory at Pittsburgh.

headline.seo: Flyers Rally to Take Game 1 From Penguins in Overtime
headline.main: Flyers Rally to Beat Penguins in Overtime
headline.print_headline: Flyers Rally to Beat Penguins in Overtime
